Name: Canterbury
Notes: NB: Oved states it was still existing in 1984, when he presumably last researched it. After my own research, I have concluded the commune finally disintegrated as an active site 8 years after the date given by Oved, in 1992. It then transitioned to (and still remains) a thriving historical site, with community life replicated through lunches, tours, exhibitions, etc.

Name: Sabathday Lake
Notes: NB: Oved's date of 1794 is wrong for start. Still active in 2021! NB: 1984 is the date given by Oved, but the community remains very much in tact, 'the only active Shaker community in the world today' according to their website.

Name: Bon Homme (Hutterites)
Notes: And counting! It is still in existence today. Oved put the date at 1984, which is the last record he had available to him presumably.

Name: Silver Lake
Notes: NB: No categorisation by Oved - so makes sense to put it down to a misc.
